title: Add optional hardware acceleration to RenderTargetBitmap
body: There currently appears to be no way to export a hardware-rendered 3D scene! See http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2179042/rendertargetbitmap-and-viewport3d-quality-issues

comments.body: We need to generate charts using WPF in hardware straight to a DirectX texture which we can then render in a DirectX without moving the image between the GPU and CPU. This all needs to be done offscreen without display the chart in 2D first. Hardware acceleration for RenderTargetBitmap would help to solve this.
